nodes.documentation: @title mortal contract.

nodes.documentation: @dev Emergency stop/kill method
nodes.name: kill

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the current league status.
@return active The boolean representing whether the league is active or not.
nodes.name: getStatus

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves the owners of fantasy players
@return owners The array of owners, with indices representing IDs of fantasy players.
nodes.name: getOwners

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves the winner of the league
@return winner Self-explanatory.
nodes.name: getWinner
getBalance
draftPlayer

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows users to buy into the league. Handles potential for a user to buy in multiple times. Default balance allocation
is 10. Emits boughtIn event.
nodes.name: buyIn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Declare winner and pay him/her. Emit declareWinner event.
@param _account The account of the winner.
nodes.name: declareWinner

nodes.documentation: @dev Return funds (aka buy-in) to users in case of emergency. TO-DO: loop through and return funds.
nodes.name: emergencyReturn

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows users to withdraw funds. TO-DO: rethink this function; possibly require multisig to enable this.
nodes.name: withdrawFunds

nodes.documentation: @dev Helper method for tests
nodes.name: makeActive
